text: Fatbardh Deliallisi (5 April 1932 – 15 October 2011) is a former football player who played for the Albania national team.Ndahet nga jeta Fatbardh Deliallisi ==International career== He made his debut for Albania in a September 1957 friendly match against China and earned a total of 12 caps, scoring no goals. His final international was a May 1965 FIFA World Cup qualification match against Northern Ireland. ==Honours== *Albanian Superliga: 7 :: 1954, 1957, 1958, 1959, 1961, 1963, 1964Albania - Championship Winning Teams - RSSSF ==References== ==External links== * *Profile at EU Football * Category:1932 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Association football defenders Category:Albanian footballers Category:Albania international footballers Category:KF Erzeni players Category:FK Partizani Tirana players
title: Fatbardh Deliallisi
